description:
2016考研英语大纲已于9月18日出炉，跟2015年考研英语大纲相比，没有什么大的变化。现在老师就为考生预测一下2016考研大纲的作文。

一、小作文

1. 小作文必备书信之申请信

1)Directions:

Imagine you are a student who wants to apply for the New Star scholarship offered by your university. Write a letter to the person concerned which should include

(1) the purpose of writing the letter;

(2) your qualifications for the scholarship;

(3) your thanks.

You should write about 100 words. Do not sign your own name at the end of the letter. Use "Li Ming" instead.

You do not need to write the address.

2)经典范文

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to you in order to apply for the New Star Scholarship.

As you can see from the attached grade sheet, I am one of the top students in my department. I have also represented the university at the 8th English Speaking Contest, where I was placed first. It is because I have attained such high standards that the Dean, Prof. Wang, suggested I apply for the scholarship. I believe that I do not only do well in my study, also contribute to campus life and our university in my extracurricular activities, particularly as departmental head of the Student Union.

Thank you in advance for considering my application.

Yours sincerely,

Li Ming

3)推荐原因：

首先，申请信是考研英语大纲规定的必考类型；

其次，纵观考研英语小作文的命题规律，对于书信的考查无非都是对12种常见书信类型的反复对考查；

再次，2006年(英语一)考查了“申请资助贫困儿童”这一话题，因此相关的申请信请同学们务必关注、背诵以及仿写。

2. 小作文必备书信之询问信

1)Directions:

You are preparing for an English test and are in need of some reference books. Write a letter to the sales department of a bookstore to ask for:

(1) detailed information about the books you want,

(2) methods of payment,

(3) time and way of delivery

2)经典范文

Dear Sir or Madam,

As a student to take CET-6 in this coming December, I am writing to ask if there are some high quality test preparation materials.

I wonder if you have the following books: a vocabulary book covering the 5,500 words for the CET-6 test as well as past test papers with keys and model essays and a Longman Dictionary of Contemporary English, which I can turn for help. Besides, how should I pay for these books? By cash or by other means? Finally, if I order these books now, when can I get them and how will these books be sent to my house?

I would be grateful if you could give me an early reply.

Yours sincerely,

Li Ming

3)推荐原因：

首先，询问信是考研英语大纲规定的必考类型；

其次，纵观考研英语小作文的命题规律，对于书信的考查无非都是对12种常见书信类型的反复对考查；

再次，2014年(英语二)考查了“向未来室友询求生活建议”这一话题，因此相关的询问信请同学们务必关注、背诵以及仿写。

二、大作文

1. 英语一

预测一

Directions:

Write an essay of 160-200 words based on the following pictures. In your essay, you should:

1) describe the drawings briefly,

2) explain its intended meaning, and then

3) give your comments.

You should write neatly on ANSWER SHEET. (20 points)

This picture is humorous but reveals a profound meaning. According to this figure, we can see that two individuals are digging wells for water with spades. However, one person gives up looking for water because he digs even three holes but still cannot find any water, while the other one insists on digging one hole and finally receives an abundance of water.

This picture tells us one principle which is a famous proverb called “Success belongs to the persevering”. It is obvious that the chance of finding water is fair enough to the two men. Nevertheless, the reason leading to the completely different consequences is only their different attitudes. As students, we should not doubt that the God will favor one special group and feel upset and hopeless. To be frank, our society is realistic and it provides everyone with same opportunities. We need to seize the opportunities, correct our attitudes and be down-to-earth persons. I firmly believe that we can achieve our goals by persevering painstaking efforts. Nothing is impossible as long as we do our best. In addition, sometimes insisting itself is not absolutely unquestioned. If we choose an unpractical goal, it is just a behavior of wasting life. On the contrary, it is wise to set an objective cautiously and then keep going without any complaints.

To sum up, selecting a right target and always working for it is of great significance for all of us.

推荐理由：

1. 今年考永恒性话题可能性大过大事件

2. 永恒性话题应该会偏向相对积极的概念。

3. 根据政治环境因素，很可能不会涉及针砭时弊的任何话题，所以话题还是以个人素养、理想为导向。
